A modern cuisine take on tapas. It was like Catalan Dim Sum.  The dishes are laid out on a long bar and you take a plate and choose what you want.  The English-speaking staff heats up the hot dishes and brings them to your table.  In addition to traditional Catalan and Spanish dishes there were tiny tapas hamburgers and tiny tapas fajitas to name a couple.  The wine list was small but good and very good value.
